Hello Blog!

I’ve started a blog to record the things I am thinking about, working on, and learning. My interests range between analyzing data and designing robust predictive models, contributing to open source software, and interesting challenges that come out of working at early stage tech startups.

I’ll mostly be writing as a way to record what I am learning and how I am learning it. Writing out what I am thinking in the most detailed way possible has always been the best and fastest way for me to learn. I’ve been hankering to really dig in to deep learning, specifically autoencoders. Improving my handle on Scala is definitely on my TODO list. So, here goes nothing.

Juliet Hougland 20 January 2014
